title: Any area required or proposed for the purpose of construction of temporary or permanent transit camps and projects on any/adjacent land for the amalgamated land for developments so approved by the SRA shall also be deemed to be and treated as DRP Area, and projects approved in such area by the DRP cell of SRA shall be deemed to be DRP
clause_text: Any area required or proposed for the purpose of construction of temporary or permanent transit camps and projects on any/adjacent land for the amalgamated land for developments so approved by the SRA shall also be deemed to be and treated as DRP Area, and projects approved in such area by the DRP cell of SRA shall be deemed to be DRP.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, Structure of hut, planning sectors and related terms:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any area required or proposed for the purpose of construction of temporary or permanent transit camps and projects on any/adjacent land for the amalgamated land for developments so approved by the SRA
